title: Perfect position for tourist visit to London
text:
The hotel is situated right on Leicester Square right next door to the Odeon Cinema the hosts all the London Film Premiers. it has in walking distance many tourist features. To the north of the square is China Town with Theatre Land and Soho Beyond. To the east of the Square you are on Piccadilly Circus leading to Regent Street and Oxford Street Beyond. To the west of the Square a few streets walk takes you to Covent Garden and to the south and immediately behind the hotel is Trafalgar Square leading to Th mall Buckingham Palace or Whitehall leading to Westminster Downing Street and Big Ben. The location is perfect for tourists, The hotel is well appointed with comfortable rooms . The staff are very friendly and attentive and the restaurant is very comfortable indeed.
I would suggest if you intend a tourist trip to London you couldn't choose better.
